title: Reckless riding claims two lives
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two people died in a tragic motor accident in Daswatte, Mawanella on Sunday (21).
Sri Lanka Police said the deceased were traveling in a motorcycle, and due to excessive speed, the motorcycle had veered off the road and crashed on to a wall.
